Read my full statement calling for sweeping action on election security below: https://www.heinrich.senate.gov/press-releases/heinrich-calls-for-action-on-election-security-following-release-of-bipartisan-report-on-russias-use-of-social-media …

The 2nd volume of the Senate Intel report details Russia's weaponization of social media. Until we set up stronger protections of our election systems & take the necessary steps to prevent future foreign intervention, our democratic institutions will remain vulnerable to attack.

We need sweeping action to protect our elections and a comprehensive effort – with social media companies, Congress, federal agencies, and law enforcement working together – to push back on disinformation and false narratives.
Right now, Russia and other hostile foreign actors are manipulating social media in an effort to influence the outcome of the 2020 election and sow deeper divisions among the American people.
